recipesJson.name: eJuice Fairys Starry Night #MixinVixen
recipesJson.author: mixinvixens
recipesJson.description: I envisioned a buttery Lemonade Girl-scout cookie in a blueberry compote. Sweetener isn’t necessary but you can sweeten to taste I wouldn’t go much past 0.5% sweetener because this taste very sweet without it.

reviews.text: Fairies are cute and magical and so is this recipe which has a calming harmony and balance across the  entire vape creating a unified whole  just like the painting.
